pages.text: Falamma Ja'a Sulaymana Qala 'Atumiddunani Bimalin Fama 'Ataniya Allahu Khayrun Mimma 'Atakum Bal 'Antum Bihadiyatikum Tafrahuna
Arji` 'Ilayhim Falana'tiyannahum Bijunudin La Qibala Lahum Biha Wa Lanukhrijannahum Minha 'Adhillatan Wa Hum Saghiruna
Qala Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Mala'u 'Ayyukum Ya'tini Bi`arshiha Qabla 'An Ya'tuni Muslimina
Qala `Ifrytun Mina Al-Jinni 'Ana 'Atika Bihi Qabla 'An Taquma Min Maqamika Wa 'Inni `Alayhi Laqawiyun 'Aminun

Qala Al-Ladhi `Indahu `Ilmun Mina Al-Kitabi 'Ana 'Atika Bihi Qabla 'An Yartadda 'Ilayka Tarfuka Falamma Ra'ahu Mustaqirraan `Indahu Qala Hadha Min FaÄ‘li Rabbi Liyabluwani 'A'ashkuru 'Am 'Akfuru Wa Man Shakara Fa'innama Yashkuru Linafsihi Wa Man Kafara Fa'inna Rabbi Ghaniyun Karimun
Qala Nakkiru Laha `Arshaha Nanzur 'Atahtadi 'Am Takunu Mina Al-Ladhina La Yahtaduna
Falamma Ja'at Qila 'Ahakadha `Arshuki Qalat Ka'annahu Huwa Wa 'Utina Al-`Ilma Min Qabliha Wa Kunna Muslimina
Wa Saddaha Ma Kanat Ta`budu Min Duni Allahi 'Innaha Kanat Min Qawmin Kafirina

Qila Laha Adkhuli As-Sarha Falamma Ra'at/hu Hasibat/hu Lujjatan Wa Kashafat `An Saqayha Qala 'Innahu Sarhun Mumarradun Min Qawarira Qalat Rabbi 'Inni Zalamtu Nafsi Wa 'Aslamtu Ma`a Sulaymana Lillahi Rabbi Al-`Alamina
